snippet: On Saturday, a 28-year-old Queens man died from gunshot wounds he sustained on Friday. He was the city’s first homicide victim since Feb. 1.
abstract: Shooting of Queens man Eric Roman is first homicide in New York City in 12 days, longest such streak since 1990s.
lead_paragraph: On Saturday, a 28-year-old Queens man died from gunshot wounds he sustained on Friday. He was the city’s first homicide victim since Feb. 1.

headline.main: New York City’s Streak of Days Without a Killing Ends at 12
headline.print_headline: Streak Without a Killing Ends at 12 Days
